p: Chelating power (CHP) was determined with the method described by [ 30]. The reaction mixture consisted of 5 mL of CPS, 0.1 mL of FeCl 2 (2mM) and 0.2 mL of ferrozine (5 mM). Absorbance was measured at λ = 562 nm after 10 min of incubation at room temperature. Six dilutions of CPS were examined to plot a dose–response curve. The result was expressed as the concentration of polysaccharides providing 50% of activity based on the dose-dependent mode of action (EC 50).
